problem_text_cn: 如图,圆锥模具的母线长为10cm,底面半径为5cm,则这个圆锥模具的侧面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the length of the generatrix of the cone mold is N_0, and the radius of the bottom surface is N_1, then the lateral area of ​​the cone mold is ()
raw_answer: 试题分析:圆锥模具的母线长为10cm,底面半径为5cm,S侧面积=πrl=π×5×10=50π(cm)²故选B.
notes: 立体几何问题 缺少圆锥侧面积计算
